MajorClaims.MC1: dependence on computers is not a bad thing
MajorClaims.MC2: The whole world is dependent on computers, without which, the world will go back hundreds of years

Claims.C1: computers have provided security and sophistication
Claims.C2: Computers provide speed, increase efficiency, accuracy, precision, help to increase productivity and other countless benefits are provided by it

Premises.P1: In the modern world, computers are used everywhere
Premises.P2: Right from flying planes to sending a small document, computers are needed
Premises.P3: They are used in space programs, wars, hospitals, schools and so on
Premises.P4: Computers have made human life more easy, convenient and lightning fast
Premises.P5: in earlier days, if one had to send a message to someone in other country, it used to take months
Premises.P6: today, it can be sent in few minutes by typing a email and few clicks
Premises.P7: From a computer as big as a room, it has now been minimized to the size of a palm
Premises.P8: Nanotechnology is working to make computers to the order of microscopic levels
Premises.P9: Research on making computerized drone soldiers (unmanned computer controlled) is going on
Premises.P10: There is no end to the evolution of computers
Premises.P11: Virus programs, privacy breach, leak of confidential documents, cyber attacks, identity theft, frauds etc. are some of its demerits, from a countless list
Premises.P12: Computers expose children to vulgar materials
Premises.P13: They have even invaded mental health of humans, for example, FAD (Facebook Addiction Disorder - excessive use of social networking website Facebook)
Premises.P14: Computers have intruded our lives to the effect that a satellite can peep into our homes and privates lives
Premises.P15: The recent case of Wikileaks, leaking confidential data is an example of how computers are harmful
